Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Reroute at 75th/Exchange
ShortDescription: 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via: 75th, Exchange, 76th, Coles, and 75th, due to, street blockage, near 75th/Exchange.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via: 75th, Exchange, 76th, Coles, and 75th, due to, street blockage, near 75th/Exchange.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Southbound Reroute near 75th/Exchange
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via: 71st, Exchange, 76th, Coles, due to, street blockage, near 75th/Exchange.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via: 71st, Exchange, 76th, Coles, due to, street blockage, near 75th/Exchange.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
